— MEGHAN HALEY, PA-C

[SHOP KP KIT](https://glytone.com/products/kp-kit)

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/gl3-hp-differece.jpg?v=1717181955&width=1000)

GLYTONE DIFFERENCE

## Harnessing the power of active acids and PFAVTM Glycolic Acid, Glytone is an ingredient-driven, problem solving skincare brand inspired by aesthetic dermatology.

[Discover Glytone](https://glytone.com/pages/glytone-difference)

markdown:
# Acne BPO Treatment Gel – Glytone

Sale price $36.00

/ 2.0 fl. oz.

_Formerly known as Acne 3P Gel_  
Medicated, non-whitening lotion helps fight existing acne and prevent future breakouts from forming while calming visible redness.

[

Part of our Breakout Defense Formula.

](https://glytone.com/products/breakout-control-solution)

FREE samples with every order

FREE standard delivery on all orders

30 day free returns

Best For

For Normal to Oily Skin

Free from

Non-Comedogenic

FULL INGREDIENT LIST

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: BENZOYL PEROXIDE 5% INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: WATER (AQUA), PROPANEDIOL, DIMETHYL ISOSORBIDE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, GLYCERIN, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, ACRYLAMIDE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE COPOLYMER, ISOHEXADECANE, HYDROXYACETOPHENONE, POLYSORBATE 80, POLYGLYCERYL-2 ISOSTEARATE, XANTHAN GUM, ENANTIA CHLORANTHA BARK EXTRACT, SODIUM CITRATE, TRISODIUM ETHYLENEDIAMINE DISUCCINATE, CITRIC ACID, DIETHYLHEXYL SODIUM SULFOSUCCINATE, CARBOMER, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, CITRUS GRANDIS (GRAPEFRUIT) SEED EXTRACT, ECHINACEA ANGUSTIFOLIA EXTRACT, DIMETHICONE, ARCTIUM LAPPA ROOT EXTRACT, PHENOXYETHANOL, OLEANOLIC ACID, PEG-40 STEARATE, SILICA, SORBITAN STEARATE, TOCOPHEROL

## Indications

For Normal to Oily Skin

### Acne-Prone Skin

Skin prone to acne pimples, blackheads and whiteheads.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Acne_prone_skin.webp?v=1707340310&width=500)

### Oily Skin

Resulting from an overproduction of sebum, oily skin may lead to clogged or enlarged pores and acne

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Indications_Oily_skin.webp?v=1707342421&width=500)

## Enhance Your Results

IN-OFFICE PEEL

### Salicylic Acid Peel

Visibly reduce the appearance of mild to severe acne-prone skin while improving skin clarity, texture and tone.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/08_PeelApplicator_C_1136_R1-890x550.webp?v=1707340391&width=500)

## Key Ingredients

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/BPO.webp?v=1707342517&width=500)

### Benzoyl Peroxide

5% Micronized BPO to deeply penetrate pores and eliminate bacteria while minimizing irritation

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/gl-pdp-350-mattifying.webp?v=1707342518&width=500)

### Mattifying Complex

Combination of Butylene Glycol, Enatnia Chlorantha Bar Extract and Oleanolic Acid. Clinically proven to reduce shine, pore size appearance and oil\*

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/P000XXXX-GL_AcneBPOTreatmentGel-60ml-Lifestyle-eComm-PLP-1494x1200-shadow.webp?crop=center&height=1000&v=1707342847&width=1000)

## Product Benefits

*   Unique mattifying complex reduces the appearance of pore size and shine
*   Deeply penetrates pores and helps reduce acne and prevent future blemishes without irritating skin
*   Reduces blemish inflammation without over-drying the skin

How to Use

Cleanse the skin thoroughly before applying product. Cover the affected area(s) with a thin layer one to three times daily. If going outside, apply sunscreen after using this product. If irritation or sensitivity develops, stop use of both products and ask a doctor.

markdown:
# Acne Back & Chest Treatment Spray – Glytone

![Acne Back & Chest Treatment Spray](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/products/p0006677-at-acnebackandchesttreatmentspray-240ml-ecommpdp_1.png?crop=center&height=737&v=1706907171&width=1014)

![Acne Back & Chest Treatment Spray](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/products/p0006677-at-acnebackandchesttreatmentspray-240ml-ecommpdp_1.png?crop=center&height=200&v=1706907171&width=200)

Sale price $44.00

/ 8fl oz

Combat chest and back acne, deeply clean pores and prevent new acne from forming with this quick-drying formula and innovative pump design that functions upside down for ease of use. Recommended for all acne-prone skin.

FREE samples with every order

FREE standard delivery on all orders

30 day free returns

Best For

For Normal to Oily Skin

Free from

Paraben-Free, Non-irritating

FULL INGREDIENT LIST

Active Ingredients: 2% SALICYLIC ACID Inactive Ingredients: AQUA (WATER), ALCOHOL DENAT., METHYLPROPANEDIOL, GLUCONOLACTONE, POLYSORBATE 20, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM GLUCONATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, CITRIC ACID, GLYCERIN, HIBISCUS SABDARIFFA FLOWER EXTRACT, CAMELLIA SINENSIS (GREEN TEA) LEAF EXTRACT, CENTELLA ASIATICA (GOTU KOLA) LEAF EXTRACT, CAMELLIA SINENSIS (WHITE TEA) LEAF EXTRACT, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE POWDER, SODIUM HYDROXIDE.

## Indications

For Normal to Oily Skin

### Acne-Prone Skin

Skin prone to acne pimples, blackheads and whiteheads.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Acne_prone_skin.webp?v=1707340310&width=500)

### Chest and Back Acne

Pimples, blackheads and whiteheads on the back and chest

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/AT_Acne_Back_Chest_Spray_Indications.webp?v=1707340352&width=500)

## Enhance Your Results

IN-OFFICE PEEL

### Salicylic Acid Peel

Visibly reduce the appearance of mild to severe acne-prone skin while improving skin clarity, texture and tone.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/08_PeelApplicator_C_1136_R1-890x550.webp?v=1707340391&width=500)

## Key Ingredients

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/SalicylicAcid.webp?v=1707340446&width=500)

### 2% Salicylic Acid

Exfoliates and prevents new acne blemishes form forming. Helps remove excess oil and unclog pores.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/CentellaAsiaticaExtract.webp?v=1707340445&width=500)

### Centella Asiatica Extract

Derived from Tiger Grass to help reduce the appearance of scarring

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/Glunactone.webp?v=1707340445&width=500)

### Gluconolactone

Gently lifts dead cells for a smooth and even appearance while supporting skin barrier

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/AT_Acne_Back_Chest_Spray_Lifestyle-A-1494x1200.webp?crop=center&height=1000&v=1707340988&width=1000)

## Product Benefits

*   Quick drying formula helps clarify acne on back and chest
*   Unique pump works upside down for ease of use

How to Use

Holding bottle 3-6 inches away, spray directly onto cleansed, affected areas of the back, shoulders and chest. Let dry prior to putting on clothes. Because excessive drying of the skin may occur, start with one application daily, then gradually increase to two to three times daily if needed, or as directed by a physician. If bothersome dryness or peeling occurs, reduce application to once a day or every other day.

markdown:
# Acne Clearing Cleanser – Glytone

Sale price $40.00

/ 6.7 fl. oz.

This gel face cleanser features 2% Salicylic Acid to wash away surface debris while it deeply cleans pores to prevent new acne from forming. Recommended for mild to moderate acne-prone skin.

FREE samples with every order

FREE standard delivery on all orders

30 day free returns

Best For

For Normal to Oily Skin

Free from

Fragrance-Free

FULL INGREDIENT LIST

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: 2% SALICYLIC ACID INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: AQUA (WATER), METHYLPROPANEDIOL, POLYACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER-6, SODIUM LAUROYL SARCOSINATE, HEXYLENE GLYCOL, CAPRYLOYL GLYCINE, CLEOME GYNANDRA LEAF EXTRAC, TPROPANEDIOL, XYLITYLGLUCOSIDE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, SODIUM BENZOATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, LAURIC ACID, T-BUTYL ALCOHOL, SODIUM CHLORIDE,TETRASODIUM EDTA.

## Indications

For Normal to Oily Skin

### Acne-Prone Skin

Skin prone to acne pimples, blackheads and whiteheads.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Acne_prone_skin.webp?v=1707340310&width=500)

### Oily Skin

Resulting from an overproduction of sebum, oily skin may lead to clogged or enlarged pores and acne

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Indications_Oily_skin.webp?v=1707342421&width=500)

## Enhance Your Results

IN-OFFICE PEEL

### Salicylic Acid Peel

Visibly reduce the appearance of mild to severe acne-prone skin while improving skin clarity, texture and tone.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/08_PeelApplicator_C_1136_R1-890x550.webp?v=1707340391&width=500)

## Key Ingredients

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/SalicylicAcid.webp?v=1707340446&width=500)

### 2% Salicylic Acid

Exfoliates and prevents new acne blemishes form forming. Helps remove excess oil and unclog pores.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/P0001819_Acne_Clearing_Cleanser.jpg?crop=center&height=1000&v=1707362436&width=1000)

## Product Benefits

*   Washes away debris and deeply clears pores
*   Prevents new acne blemishes, blackheads and whiteheads
*   Smooths and clears skin in preparation for further treatment

How to Use

Dispense a small amount into your hand and mix with a little water. Apply a thin layer over face in a circular motion and rinse thoroughly with warm water two times daily. Because excessive drying of the skin may occur, start with one application daily, then gradually increase to two times daily, or as directed by a physician. If bothersome dryness or peeling occurs, reduce application to once a day or every other day.

Active Ingredients: SALICYLIC ACID 2% Inactive Ingredients: WATER (AQUA), DEXTRIN, POLYDEXTROSE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, POLYSORBATE 20, PROPANEDIOL, AMYLOPECTIN, NIACINAMIDE, GLYCERIN, EPILOBIUM FLEISCHERI EXTRACT, CITRIC ACID, POTASSIUM SORBATE, ALLANTOIN, MANDELIC ACID, SALIX ALBA (WILLOW) BARK EXTRACT, SERENOA SERRULATA FRUIT EXTRACT, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, PYRUS MALUS (APPLE) FRUIT EXTRACT, CALENDULA OFFICINALIS FLOWER EXTRACT, GLYCYRRHIZA GLABRA (LICORICE) ROOT EXTRACT, HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WITCH HAZEL) BARK/LEAF/TWIG EXTRACT, LEUCONOSTOC/RADISH ROOT FERMENT FILTRATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE

## Indications

For Normal to Oily Skin

### Acne-Prone Skin

Skin prone to acne pimples, blackheads and whiteheads.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Acne_prone_skin.webp?v=1707340310&width=500)

### Oily Skin

Resulting from an overproduction of sebum, oily skin may lead to clogged or enlarged pores and acne

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Indications_Oily_skin.webp?v=1707342421&width=500)

## Enhance Your Results

IN-OFFICE PEEL

### Salicylic Acid Peel

Visibly reduce the appearance of mild to severe acne-prone skin while improving skin clarity, texture and tone.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/08_PeelApplicator_C_1136_R1-890x550.webp?v=1707340391&width=500)

## Key Ingredients

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/SalicylicAcid.webp?v=1707340446&width=500)

### 2% Salicylic Acid

Exfoliates and prevents new acne blemishes form forming. Helps remove excess oil and unclog pores.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/MandelicAcid.jpg?v=1707363263&width=500)

### Mandelic Acid

Gently exfoliates

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/Niacinamide.jpg?v=1707363263&width=500)

### Niacinamide

Visibly brightens and improves appearance of dark spots

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/AT_Acne_Toner_Lifestyle-1-A-1494x1200.jpg?crop=center&height=1000&v=1707362961&width=1000)

## Product Benefits

*   Formulated with naturally derived astringents and Salicylic Acid to reduce acne
*   Clarifying and soothing ingredients provide a clear complexion

How to Use

After cleansing, apply toner to a cotton pad and gently apply over affected area one to three times daily. Do not rinse. Because excessive drying of the skin may occur, start with one application daily, then gradually increase to two to three times daily if needed, or as directed by a doctor. If bothersome dryness or peeling occurs, reduce application to once a day or every other day.

markdown:
# Acne Clarifying Treatment Mask – Glytone

_**New & Improved Formula**_

A powerful clarifying and exfoliating at-home mask with a unique cooling effect soothes the skin, deep cleans pores to fight against existing breakouts, prevents new acne from forming, and purifies pores without stripping the skin, promoting a visibly clearer complexion.

FREE samples with every order

FREE standard delivery on all orders

30 day free returns

Best For

All Stages of Acne

Free from

Fragrance-Free, Paraben-Free, Alcohol-Free

FULL INGREDIENT LIST

WATER, BENTONITE, KAOLIN, GLYCERIN, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, GLYCERYL RICINOLEATE, STEARIC ACID, GLYCERYL STEARATE, GLYCOLIC ACID, POLYSORBATE 20, LEUCONOSTOC/RADISH ROOT FERMENT FILTRATE, LACTIC ACID, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE POWDER, BISABOLOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, CITRIC ACID, MENTHYL LACTATE, SODIUM GLUCONATE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, TROPOLONE.

## Indications

All Stages of Acne

### Acne-Prone Skin

Skin prone to acne pimples, blackheads and whiteheads.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Acne_prone_skin.webp?v=1707340310&width=500)

### Oily Skin

Resulting from an overproduction of sebum, oily skin may lead to clogged or enlarged pores and acne

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Indications_Oily_skin.webp?v=1707342421&width=500)

## Enhance Your Results

IN-OFFICE PEEL

### Salicylic Acid Peel

Visibly reduce the appearance of mild to severe acne-prone skin while improving skin clarity, texture and tone.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/08_PeelApplicator_C_1136_R1-890x550.webp?v=1707340391&width=500)

## Key Ingredients

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/P0007208-AT-AcneClarifyingTreatmentMask85g_sulfur_JPEG-Ingredients-350x350.jpg?v=1707360291&width=500)

### 6.4% Sulfur

Natural antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties support a clearer complexion.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/P0007208-AT-AcneClarifyingTreatmentMask85g_lactic_acid_JPEG-Ingredients-350x350.jpg?v=1707360474&width=500)

### Lactic Acid

An effective exfoliator that helps provide the skin with additional hydration as it works to brighten dark spots.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/P0007208-AT-AcneClarifyingTreatmentMask85g_GlycolicAcid_JPEG-Ingredients-350x350.jpg?v=1707360531&width=500)

### Glycolic Acid

An AHA that helps to provide a more even and hydrated, tone & texture.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/P0007208-AT-AcneClarifyingTreatmentMask85g_aloe_JPEG-Ingredients-350x350.jpg?v=1707360583&width=500)

### Aloe + Bisabolol

Aloe and Bisabolol work to soothe, hydrate and calm inflamed skin.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/P0001256_Acne_Treatment_Mask.jpg?crop=center&height=1000&v=1707361815&width=1000)

## Product Benefits

*   Cleans pores to fight breakouts
*   Prevents new acne from forming
*   Promotes a clear complexion
*   Minimizes appearance of blemishes and pores
*   Aloe + Bisabolol soothe and calm inflamed skin

How to Use

Cleanse the skin thoroughly before applying this mask. Apply a generous amount to the entire face and neck and leave on for 20-25 minutes. Remove with lukewarm water in a gentle circular motion. Because excessive drying of the skin may occur, start with one application daily, then gradually increase to two to three times daily if needed. If bothersome dryness or peeling occurs, reduce application to once a day or every other day.

## Indications

For All Acne-Prone Skin

### Acne-Prone Skin

Skin prone to acne pimples, blackheads and whiteheads.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Acne_prone_skin.webp?v=1707340310&width=500)

### Oily Skin

Resulting from an overproduction of sebum, oily skin may lead to clogged or enlarged pores and acne

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Indications_Oily_skin.webp?v=1707342421&width=500)

## Enhance Your Results

IN-OFFICE PEEL

### Salicylic Acid Peel

Visibly reduce the appearance of mild to severe acne-prone skin while improving skin clarity, texture and tone.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/08_PeelApplicator_C_1136_R1-890x550.webp?v=1707340391&width=500)

## Key Ingredients

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/SalicylicAcid.jpg?v=1707364149&width=500)

### Salicylic Acid

Deeply clears pores to prevent new acne blemishes, blackheads and whiteheads

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/P0005684_Acne_Self-Foaming_Cleanser.jpg?crop=center&height=1000&v=1707363954&width=1000)

## Product Benefits

*   Self-foaming technology prolongs contact of Salicylic Acid with the skin for better efficacy in blemish control
*   Cleanses surface debris, clears pores and gently exfoliates
*   Heals existing acne pimples, blackheads and whiteheads
*   May also be used for a mask-like cleanse (leave on 30 seconds before rinsing)
*   Improves circulation and enhances cell turnover

How to Use

At initial use, turn pump head counter-clockwise to unlock. Dispense a small amount into your hand and mix with a little water. Apply a thin layer over face in a circular motion. Rinse thoroughly with warm water two times daily. For a mask-like cleanse, leave on for 30 seconds before rinsing. Because excessive drying of the skin may occur, start with one application daily, then gradually increase to two times daily if needed, or as directed by a physician. If bothersome dryness or peeling occurs, reduce application to once a day or every other day.

Protection against UVA/UVB rays

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Indications_Sun_Protection_Sun_damaged_skin_1.jpg?v=1707875100&width=500)

## Enhance Your Results

IN-OFFICE PEEL

### Mandelic Acid Peel

Visibly improve overall skin texture and tone while soothing redness for a calm, more even complexion.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/08_PeelApplicator_C_1136_R1-890x550.jpg?v=1707874613&width=500)

## Key Ingredients

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/gl-pdp-350-active-stress-defense.jpg?v=1707875368&width=500)

### Active Stress Defense Technology

Defends skin against oxidative stress.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/Ellagic-Acid-Complex.jpg?v=1707875441&width=500)

### Ellagic Acid Complex

Extracted from African Birch Bark, helps provide powerful antioxidant protection while visibly reducing fine lines and wrinkles.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/Niacinamide.jpg?v=1707363263&width=500)

### Niacinamide

Visibly brightens and improves appearance of dark spots

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/P0006674_AD_reshoot3_1980x1590-02.jpg?crop=center&height=1000&v=1707874788&width=1000)

## Product Benefits

*   Mineral UVA/UVB filters protect skin
*   Defends skin against free radicals
*   Helps rebuild healthy skin post-procedure
*   Helps decrease appearance of wrinkle depth
*   Brightens and evens tone while minimizing the look of pores
*   Nourishes and soothes skin

How to Use

Apply after your morning routine, following C+ Advanced Antioxidant Serum and before applying make-up. Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply - after 40 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying, at least every 2 hours. Sun protection measures: Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use a sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: limiting time in the sun, especially from 10 a.m. - 2p.m., wearing long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats and sunglasses. Children under 6 months of age: ask a doctor.

# Acne Tinted Spot Treatment – Glytone

Sale price $26.00

/ 1 fl. oz.

A fast-acting 8% Sulfur acne treatment to conceal, dry and clear blemishes while preventing new acne from forming. Blendable, tinted formula can be used alone, under makeup, or on the go for touch-ups.

FREE samples with every order

FREE standard delivery on all orders

30 day free returns

Best For

For Mild to Moderate Acne

FULL INGREDIENT LIST

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: 8% SULFUR, 2% RESORCINOL INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: AQUA (WATER), PROPYLENE GLYCOL, ALCOHOL DENAT. , POLYSORBATE 20, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, MAGNESIUM ALUMINUM SILICATE, SODIUM STEAROYL GLUTAMATE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, GLYCERYL STEARATE, POLYSORBATE 60, CHLOROXYLENOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, FRAGRANCE, PHENOXYETHANOL, POLYGLYCERYL-6 PALMITATE/SUCCINATE ,XANTHAN GUM, IRON OXIDES, TITANIUM DIOXIDE, ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL.

## Indications

For Mild to Moderate Acne

### Acne-Prone Skin

Skin prone to acne pimples, blackheads and whiteheads.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Acne_prone_skin.webp?v=1707340310&width=500)

### Oily Skin

Resulting from an overproduction of sebum, oily skin may lead to clogged or enlarged pores and acne

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Indications_Oily_skin.webp?v=1707342421&width=500)

## Enhance Your Results

IN-OFFICE PEEL

### Salicylic Acid Peel

Visibly reduce the appearance of mild to severe acne-prone skin while improving skin clarity, texture and tone.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/08_PeelApplicator_C_1136_R1-890x550.webp?v=1707340391&width=500)

## Key Ingredients

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/Resorcinol.jpg?v=1707873820&width=500)

### Resorcinol

Acts to help remove dry, roughened tissue

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/Sulfur.jpg?v=1707873909&width=500)

### Sulfur

Unclogs pores and inhibits P. acnes bacteria

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/P0006650_Acne_Tinted_Spot_Treatment.jpg?crop=center&height=1000&v=1707873171&width=1000)

## Product Benefits

*   Dries and clears existing acne blemishes
*   Penetrates pores to help prevent new acne blemishes, pimples, blackheads and whiteheads
*   Clears pores and infected skin of acne-causing bacteria
*   Blendable, tinted formula helps conceal existing blemishes

How to Use

Shake well. Cleanse skin thoroughly before applying this product. Cover the affected area with a thin layer one to three times daily. Because excessive drying of the skin may occur, start with one application daily, then gradually increase to two to three times daily if needed or as directed by a doctor. If bothersome dryness or peeling occurs, reduce application to once a day or every other day.

# Professional Treatments – Glytone

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/GL_Model_1580x840_60158930-4d00-44bf-a305-3813101a1f4f.webp?v=1709227019&width=1000)

## Patented Advanced Technology

The Glytone Difference offers solutions for aging, hyperpigmented, acne-prone and redness-prone skin. Stronger efficacy and less downtime tolerability: deliver optimal outcomes with less surface trauma.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/pt-img2-new.webp?v=1709227032&width=1000)

BENEFITS

## Why get a chemical peel?

Chemical peels help remove damaged skin cells, allowing healthy skin to take its place to reveal brighter, smoother and renewed skin.Glytone Peels can help target a variety of unique skin concerns, like acne, signs of aging, hyperpigmentation and photodamage, as well as target specific concerns on the face, hands, back & chest, eyes and neck. Each non-invasive procedure helps support collagen production and resurface skin to maintain optimal skin health.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/difference-img3-22.webp?v=1709226646&width=1000)

PATENTED SYSTEM

## PFAV™Glycolic Acid

**Precision Free Acid Value™ demonstrates the amount of bioavailable Glycolic Acid in a formula, delivering optimal levels to moisturize, exfoliate, smooth and polish skin**

*   Delivers more free Glycolic Acid to the skin to achieve a higher efficacy
*   Allows skin to have a customized system with varying strengths of AHA
*   Provides rapid, visible and predictable results

markdown:
# Reviews – Glytone

**The only thing that keeps me acne free!**

I am in my early 30s and This is the only product that works for my stubborn adult acne. I struggle with acne and this is the only product thats keeps my face acne free. Every time I’ve stopped using it, I have regretted it. It works so fast. I love what it does for my darks spots as-well. Honestly if you can’t afford to use all of the Glytone products this is the only one you truly need. When I can afford to buy the others I do, but this is the one I cannot live without.

**Great product**

I have used this product consistently for a couple of years, as suggested by my dermatologist. I have found it to be exactly what it claims to be...that improves fine lines and wrinkles. It is also easy to apply.

**This works!**

I’ve been using the eye cream for over a year. It goes on easy and absorbs quickly. It has whitened my dark circles and has helped my crows feet look better.

This stuff is the holy grail for sensitive skin. It is effective yet doesn’t over dry.

**Rejuve lotion 20**

Please please bring this back to us!!!! I call and get the same answer all the time!! That your not discontinuing but don't know when it will be back!! Its so heartbreaking & frustrating we can't get a real answer ??????

**I love this product!**

My skin is smooth after just a few weeks. I use it 2-3 times a week, which has been working well so far.

**Great product**

I have been using this product for several years and it is part of my daily regime to keep my skin as healthy as possible. I will use it forever.

**Life Saver!**

This is the only thing that works for my rosacea and combination skin.

**BRING IT BACK**

PLEASE RESTOCK THE PRODUCT! What is going on? its been out of stock for months! Can you give your customers some transparency please - are they being discontinued? reformulated? are you having supply chain issues? Please let us know.

**Serum**

I love Glytone and the #17 Exfoliating Serum. I can feel it working as soon as I put it on. I wish they still made the cleansing pads!

**LOVE THIS LOTION**

Please, please bring this back. I have been using it for years and absolutely love this formula. Again, PLEASE BRING THIS PRODUCT BACK.

**Mini Peel Gel**

I received a sample with a previous order and used it about once a week until gone. Now I have a full container of it. It’s easy to use and for the brief time its on is easy to forget. It’s light and leaves skin feeling refreshed. For many years Glytone products have been my daily routine. People remark about how my skin reflects my health which of course makes me happy.

**Just Wow! Even on sensitive skin.**

As a consumer of brands to include; La Mer, Sisley, and Natura Bisse I am more than impressed, and very pleased with this product. I achieved better results after 2 applications of this peel than any other of the above brands. My skin can be sensitive to peels and most “turnover” products in home or at Spa can burn or irritate with no real visible results. This left my skin dewy and bright. Don’t be fooled. It does the job as my friends with normal skin tried it as well and loved it! It’s now clear why it was back ordered so long. So glad I took a chance. Couldn’t be happier! Best results ever! Thank you.

**Do not like texture**

I have used this product before and l liked it. However, the texture of the product has changed or was frozen en route. It is very thick, will not mix, and will not come out through the pumper. I have to take the pumper off, turn it upside down, and hit it on the counter to dispense. Will probably not purchase again

I actually use this on scalp  
as a a exfoliant

Love it

Long time user  
Great products  
Honest company

**Best night cream**

I love this cream. I love the texture and how it feels on my face. Second jar ordered

This cleanser works very well for my dry skin, especially in the winter season.

**I miss this!**

Please bring it back. My dermatologist recommended it years ago & I miss it. It helped exfoliate dead skin from my retinol.

**A amazing product**

This is a unique amazing actually fun di use product this isn't my first rodeo with this product I love how different acid combination alongside other select ingredients work to lighten brighten and smooth complexion I highly highly recommend and use this product thank you glytone for fast tangible results

markdown:
# AHA+ Ultra Softening Foot Cream – Glytone

Sale price $58.00

/ 1.7 oz.

AHA+ Ultra Softening Foot Cream helps provide an instant smoothing effect to soften, exfoliate and condition rough, dry patches. Formulated with 29.5% PFAV™ Glycolic Acid, Lactobionic Acid and Urea to retexturize callused areas on heels, while intensely hydrating. Easy-to-use, at-home treatment helps reveal smoother, softer skin.

[

Part of our Body Refinement Complex.

](https://glytone.com/products/dermal-smoothing-complex)

FREE samples with every order

FREE standard delivery on all orders

30 day free returns

Best For

For Rough And Dry Skin

Free from

Fragrance-Free, Paraben-Free

FULL INGREDIENT LIST

AQUA (WATER), GLYCOLIC ACID, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, SUGARCANE-DERIVED SQUALANE, STEARIC ACID, PEG-40 STEARATE, GLYCERIN, MAGNESIUM ALUMINUM SILICATE, POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE, GLYCERYL STEARATE, LACTOBIONIC ACID, PEG-100 STEARATE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, FARNESOL, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM GLUCONATE, UREA.

## Indications

For Rough And Dry Skin

### Callused Skin

A lack of moisture, creating rough, cracked skin on heels and/or elbows

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PP0007207_GL_AHA_UltraSofteningFootCream_CallusedFeet_890x550_fa951066-df8d-4317-8594-098e944dd83f.jpg?v=1707879606&width=500)

### Rough Patches

Rough, dry patches are caused by dryness and lack of exfoliation & moisturization.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PP0007207_GL_AHA_UltraSofteningFootCream_Rough-Patches_890x550_V2.jpg?v=1707879606&width=500)

### Dry Skin

Resulting from a lack of sebum, dry skin is often tight or rough to the touch and/or dull in appearance.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Indications_Dry_skin_1.jpg?v=1707879606&width=500)

## Key Ingredients

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PP0007207_GL_AHA_UltraSofteningFootCream_GlycolicAcid_350x350_19043ce5-4a1c-47dd-b9fd-fdbc81f88611.jpg?v=1707879986&width=500)

### 29.5% PFAV Glycolic Acid

Deeply exfoliates and sloughs off dead skin

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PP0007207_GL_AHA_UltraSofteningFootCream_Squalane_350x350_9e4b392b-8e98-4c25-846f-59fcae9c9f10.jpg?v=1707879986&width=500)

### Sugarcane-derived Squalane

Hydrates and moisturizes the skin

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PP0007207_GL_AHA_UltraSofteningFootCream_Urea_350x350_79ef8a3a-2169-4d70-a7b2-5b223798123a.jpg?v=1707879986&width=500)

### Urea

A humectant and natural moisturizing factor that softens skin

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PP0007207_GL_AHA_UltraSofteningFootCream_LabatonicAcid_350x350_8c896572-3480-45d2-adde-459a7855791e.jpg?v=1707879986&width=500)

### Lactobionic Acid

An AHA that helps smooth skin

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/GL_AHA_UltraSofteningFootCream_HowToUse_1480x1710_f9933035-68de-452a-ad98-e00043f98c64.jpg?crop=center&height=1000&v=1707879444&width=1000)

## Product Benefits

*   Helps provide an instant smoothing effect
*   Softens skin & deeply exfoliates
*   Helps retexturize callused areas
*   Intensely hydrates
*   Easy-to-use, at-home treatment helps reveal smoother, softer skin

How to Use

Gently massage onto dry, callused heels or as directed by a physician. Leave on for 10–15 minutes and rinse with warm water.

# Daily Body Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 15 – Glytone

Sale price $62.00

/ 12 fl. oz.

Exfoliate, moisturize and protect with this formula featuring Glycolic Acid, Shea Butter and SPF 15 to provide UVA/UVB protection. This body lotion leaves skin soft and smooth while correcting texture imperfections.

FREE samples with every order

FREE standard delivery on all orders

30 day free returns

Best For

For All Skin Types

Free from

Fragrance-Free

FULL INGREDIENT LIST

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: AVOBENZONE 2 % OCTINOXATE 7.5 % OCTOCRYLENE 1.86 % OXYBENZONE 3 % INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: AQUA (WATER), GLYCOLIC ACID, C12-15 ALKYL BENZOATE, CYCLOPENTASILOXANE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, GLYCERIN, GLYCERYL STEARATE, PEG-100 STEARATE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, CYCLOTETRASILOXANE, PEG-40 STEARATE, CETYL ALCOHOL, DIMETHICONOL, CHOLESTEROL, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER, POLYACRYLAMIDE, PHENOXYETHANOL, CETEARYL GLUCOSIDE, C13-14 ISOPARAFFIN, METHYLPARABEN, XANTHAN GUM, DISODIUM EDTA, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, LAURETH-7

## Indications

For All Skin Types

### Rough, bumpy skin

Rough patches and small blemish-like bumps typically found on arms, thighs and cheeks

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Indications_Keratosis_Pilaris.jpg?v=1707880609&width=500)

### Dry Skin

Resulting from a lack of sebum, dry skin is often tight or rough to the touch and/or dull in appearance.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Indications_Dry_skin_1.jpg?v=1707879606&width=500)

## Enhance Your Results

IN-OFFICE PEEL

### Glycolic Acid Peel

Visibly reduce fine lines, wrinkles and photo-damage while increasing hydration, plumping skin and improving overall texture and tone.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/08_PeelApplicator_C_1136_R1-890x550.jpg?v=1707874613&width=500)

## Key Ingredients

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/GlycolicAcid-SugarCane.jpg?v=1707880765&width=500)

### Glycolic Acid

Exfoliates dead surface skin cells, helping to smooth rough bumps and dry patches

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/shea_butter.jpg?v=1707880764&width=500)

### Shea Butter

Hydrates, moisturizes and calms the skin

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/VitaminE.jpg?v=1707880765&width=500)

### Vitamin E

Helps nourish and provide powerful antioxidant protection

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/P0001265_Daily_Body_Lotion.jpg?crop=center&height=1000&v=1707880458&width=1000)

## Product Benefits

*   Exfoliates dead surface skin cells, helping to smooth rough bumps and dry patches
*   Hydrates and softens the skin
*   SPF 15 provides UVA & UVB protection
*   Visibly reduces the appearance of dark spots due to sun exposure
*   Rejuvenates and retexturizes the skin

How to Use

At least 15 minutes before sun exposure, apply Daily Body Lotion once daily, or as directed by a physician. Apply a sunscreen with broad spectrum SPF 15 or higher every 2 hours for increased sun protection. Use a water-resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating. Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease the risk, regularly use a sunscreen with a broad spectrum SPF 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including: limit time in the sun, especially from 10 a.m. - 2 p.m. and wear long sleeve shirts, pants, hats, and sunglasses

# Age-Defying Peptide+ Overnight Restorative Cream – Glytone

Sale price $86.00

/ 1.7 fl. oz

A restorative cream featuring a powerful tetrapeptide complex that helps firm skin and reduce the appearance of wrinkles. Glycolic Acid works to even skin tone and texture while Hyaluronic Acid hydrates and plumps.

[

Part of our Glytone Winter Hydration Renewal Duo.

](https://glytone.com/products/glytone-winter-hydration-renewal-duo)

FREE samples with every order

FREE standard delivery on all orders

30 day free returns

Best For

For All Skin Types

Free from

Fragrance-Free, Paraben-Free

FULL INGREDIENT LIST

Aqua (Water), Glycolic Acid, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Isononyl Isononanoate, Arachidyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Albizia Julibrissin Bark Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Polyacrylate-13, Gluconolactone, Glycerin, Behenyl Alcohol, Dipentaerythrityl Pentaisononanoate, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Polysorbate 20, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Polyisobutene, Arachidyl Glucoside, Tocopheryl Glucoside, Sodium Benzoate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Gluconate, Hyaluronic Acid, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-11, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-9

## Indications

For All Skin Types

### Premature Aging Skin

Fine lines and wrinkles; Skin damage caused by environmental factors or oxidative stress.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Indications_Premature_aging.jpg?v=1707875046&width=500)

### Uneven Tone

Irregular darkening of the skin, resulting in dark patches or spots.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Indications_Uneven_Tone.jpg?v=1707878139&width=500)

## Enhance Your Results

IN-OFFICE PEEL

### Mandelic Acid Peel

Visibly improve overall skin texture and tone while soothing redness for a calm, more even complexion.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/08_PeelApplicator_C_1136_R1-890x550.jpg?v=1707874613&width=500)

## Key Ingredients

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/gl-pdp-350-tetrapeptide.jpg?v=1707878304&width=500)

### Tetrapeptide Complex

Known to give the skin a firm look and reduce the appearance of wrinkles

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/AlbiziaJulibrissin.jpg?v=1707878341&width=500)

### Albizia Extract

Helps to combat signs of fatigue

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/HyaluronicAcid.jpg?v=1707878350&width=500)

### Hyaluronic Acid

Plumps and hydrates the skin

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/P0006660_AD_Peptide_OvernightRestorativeCream-Lifestyle-1980x1590.jpg?crop=center&height=1000&v=1707877983&width=1000)

## Product Benefits

*   Works to even skin tone and texture
*   Reduces the appearance of wrinkles

How to Use

In the evening, apply to face, neck and décolleté. For best results, use with the Glytone Age-Defying collection.

# Privacy policy – Glytone

This Privacy Policy describes how glytone.com (the “Site” or “we”) collects, uses, and discloses your Personal Information when you visit or make a purchase from the Site.

## COLLECTING PERSONAL INFORMATION

When you visit the Site, we collect certain information about your device, your interaction with the Site, and information necessary to process your purchases. We may also collect additional information if you contact us for customer support. In this Privacy Policy, we refer to any information that can uniquely identify an individual (including the information below) as “Personal Information”. See the list below for more information about what Personal Information we collect and why.

## DEVICE INFORMATION

Examples of Personal Information collected: version of web browser, IP address, time zone, cookie information, what sites or products you view, search terms, and how you interact with the Site.

Purpose of collection: to load the Site accurately for you, and to perform analytics on Site usage to optimize our Site.

Source of collection: Collected automatically when you access our Site using cookies, log files, web beacons, tags, or pixels.

Disclosure for a business purpose: shared with our processor Shopify, Klaviyo, Google.

## ORDER INFORMATION

Examples of Personal Information collected: name, billing address, shipping address, payment information (including credit card numbers, login information to payment platforms), email address, and phone number.

Purpose of collection: to provide products or services to you to fulfill our contract, to process your payment information, arrange for shipping, and provide you with invoices and/or order confirmations, communicate with you, screen our orders for potential risk or fraud, and when in line with the preferences you have shared with us, provide you with information or advertising relating to our products or services.

## SOURCE OF COLLECTION: COLLECTED FROM YOU.

Disclosure for a business purpose: shared with our processor Shopify, Google, Facebook, Klaviyo, Yotpo, GoFlow, UPS, USPS, FedX.

## CUSTOMER SUPPORT INFORMATION

Examples of Personal Information collected: name, address, purchase history.

Purpose of collection: to provide customer support.

Source of collection: collected from you.

Disclosure for a business purpose: Customer Support

## MINORS

The Site is not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not intentionally collect Personal Information from children. If you are the parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with Personal Information, please contact us at the address below to request deletion.

## SHARING PERSONAL INFORMATION

We share your Personal Information with service providers to help us provide our services and fulfill our contracts with you, as described above. For example:

We use Shopify to power our online store. You can read more about how Shopify uses your Personal Information here: https://www.shopify.com/legal/privacy.

We may share your Personal Information to comply with applicable laws and regulations, to respond to a subpoena, search warrant or other lawful request for information we receive, or to otherwise protect our rights.

Google platform and entities, Facebook, and Yotpo

## BEHAVIORAL ADVERTISING

As described above, we use your Personal Information to provide you with targeted advertisements or marketing communications we believe may be of interest to you. For example:

We use Google Analytics to help us understand how our customers use the Site. You can read more about how Google uses your Personal Information here: https://policies.google.com/privacy?hl=en.You can also opt-out of Google Analytics here: https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout.

We share information about your use of the Site, your purchases, and your interaction with our ads on other websites with our advertising partners. We collect and share some of this information directly with our advertising partners, and in some cases through the use of cookies or other similar technologies (which you may consent to, depending on your location).

For more information about how targeted advertising works, you can visit the Network Advertising Initiative’s (“NAI”) educational page at http://www.networkadvertising.org/understanding-online-advertising/how-does-it-work.

## YOU CAN OPT OUT OF TARGETED ADVERTISING BY:

FACEBOOK - https://www.facebook.com/settings/?tab=ads

GOOGLE - https://www.google.com/settings/ads/anonymous

BING - https://advertise.bingads.microsoft.com/en-us/resources/policies/personalized-ads\]

Additionally, you can opt out of some of these services by visiting the Digital Advertising Alliance’s opt-out portal at: http://optout.aboutads.info/.

## USING PERSONAL INFORMATION

We use your personal Information to provide our services to you, which includes: offering products for sale, processing payments, shipping and fulfillment of your order, and keeping you up to date on new products, services, and offers.

## YOUR CONSENT;

The performance of the contract between you and the Site;

Compliance with our legal obligations;

To protect your vital interests;

To perform a task carried out in the public interest;

For our legitimate interests, which do not override your fundamental rights and freedoms.

## RETENTION

When you place an order through the Site, we will retain your Personal Information for our records unless and until you ask us to erase this information. For more information on your right of erasure, please see the ‘Your rights’ section below.

## AUTOMATIC DECISION-MAKING

If you are a resident of the EEA, you have the right to object to processing based solely on automated decision-making (which includes profiling), when that decision-making has a legal effect on you or otherwise significantly affects you.

We DO NOT engage in fully automated decision-making that has a legal or otherwise significant effect using customer data.

Our processor Shopify uses limited automated decision-making to prevent fraud that does not have a legal or otherwise significant effect on you.

Services that include elements of automated decision-making include:

Temporary denylist of IP addresses associated with repeated failed transactions. This denylist persists for a small number of hours.

Temporary denylist of credit cards associated with denylisted IP addresses. This denylist persists for a small number of days.

## CCPA

If you are a resident of California, you have the right to access the Personal Information we hold about you (also known as the ‘Right to Know’), to port it to a new service, and to ask that your Personal Information be corrected, updated, or erased. If you would like to exercise these rights, please contact us through the contact information below info@glytone.com

If you would like to designate an authorized agent to submit these requests on your behalf, please contact us at the address below.

info@glytone.com

## COOKIES

A cookie is a small amount of information that’s downloaded to your computer or device when you visit our Site. We use a number of different cookies, including functional, performance, advertising, and social media or content cookies. Cookies make your browsing experience better by allowing the website to remember your actions and preferences (such as login and region selection). This means you don’t have to re-enter this information each time you return to the site or browse from one page to another. Cookies also provide information on how people use the website, for instance whether it’s their first time visiting or if they are a frequent visitor.

We use the following cookies to optimize your experience on our Site and to provide our services.

## COOKIES NECESSARY FOR THE FUNCTIONING OF THE STORE

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| Name | Function |
| \_ab | Used in connection with access to admin. |
| \_secure\_session\_id | Used in connection with navigation through a storefront. |
| cart | Used in connection with shopping cart. |
| cart\_sig | Used in connection with checkout. |
| cart\_ts | Used in connection with checkout. |
| checkout\_token | Used in connection with checkout. |
| secret | Used in connection with checkout. |
| secure\_customer\_sig | Used in connection with customer login. |
| storefront\_digest | Used in connection with customer login. |
| \_shopify\_u | Used to facilitate updating customer account information. |

## REPORTING AND ANALYTICS

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| Name | Function |
| \_tracking\_consent | Tracking preferences. |
| \_landing\_page | Track landing pages |
| \_orig\_referrer | Track landing pages |
| \_s | Shopify analytics. |
| \_shopify\_fs | Shopify analytics. |
| \_shopify\_s | Shopify analytics. |
| \_shopify\_sa\_p | Shopify analytics relating to marketing & referrals. |
| \_shopify\_sa\_t | Shopify analytics relating to marketing & referrals. |
| \_shopify\_y | Shopify analytics. |
| \_y | Shopify analytics. |

The length of time that a cookie remains on your computer or mobile device depends on whether it is a “persistent” or “session” cookie. Session cookies last until you stop browsing and persistent cookies last until they expire or are deleted. Most of the cookies we use are persistent and will expire between 30 minutes and two years from the date they are downloaded to your device.

You can control and manage cookies in various ways. Please keep in mind that removing or blocking cookies can negatively impact your user experience and parts of our website may no longer be fully accessible.

Most browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can choose whether or not to accept cookies through your browser controls, often found in your browser’s “Tools” or “Preferences” menu. For more information on how to modify your browser settings or how to block, manage or filter cookies can be found in your browser’s help file or through such sites as www.allaboutcookies.org.

Additionally, please note that blocking cookies may not completely prevent how we share information with third parties such as our advertising partners. To exercise your rights or opt-out of certain uses of your information by these parties, please follow the instructions in the “Behavioral Advertising” section above.

## DO NOT TRACK

Please note that because there is no consistent industry understanding of how to respond to “Do Not Track” signals, we do not alter our data collection and usage practices when we detect such a signal from your browser.

## CHANGES

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time in order to reflect, for example, changes to our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons.

## CONTACT

For more information about our privacy practices, if you have questions, or if you would like to make a complaint, please contact us by e-mail at info@glytone.com or by mail using the details provided below:

[https://glytone.com/pages/contact](https://glytone.com/pages/contact "https://glytone.com/pages/contact")

Glytone, LLC

123 Tice Blvd,

Suite 302

Woodcliff Lake, NJ 07677

Last updated: 5/25/2024

# Exfoliating Body Lotion – Glytone

Sale price $48.00

/ 8.4 fl. oz.

Daily resurfacing body lotion helps erase rough bumps and dry patches. Formulated with 17.5% Free Acid Value Glycolic Acid to exfoliate dull, dead skin cells while nourishing to reveal smoother, healthier-looking skin.

[

Part of our Body Refinement Complex.

](https://glytone.com/products/dermal-smoothing-complex)

FREE samples with every order

FREE standard delivery on all orders

30 day free returns

Best For

For Rough And Dry Skin

Free from

Fragrance-Free

FULL INGREDIENT LIST

AQUA (WATER), GLYCOLIC ACID, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, PETROLATUM, GLYCERIN, POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE, PEG-40 STEARATE, ALLANTOIN, PROPYL GALLATE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE (D-ALPHA)

## Indications

For Rough And Dry Skin

### Rough, bumpy skin

Rough patches and small blemish-like bumps typically found on arms, thighs and cheeks

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Indications_Keratosis_Pilaris.jpg?v=1707880609&width=500)

### Dry Skin

Resulting from a lack of sebum, dry skin is often tight or rough to the touch and/or dull in appearance.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/PDP_Indications_Dry_skin_1.jpg?v=1707879606&width=500)

## Enhance Your Results

IN-OFFICE PEEL

### Glycolic Acid Peel

Visibly reduce fine lines, wrinkles and photo-damage while increasing hydration, plumping skin and improving overall texture and tone.

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/08_PeelApplicator_C_1136_R1-890x550.jpg?v=1707874613&width=500)

## Key Ingredients

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/GlycolicAcid-SugarCane.jpg?v=1707880765&width=500)

### Glycolic Acid

Exfoliates dead surface skin cells, helping to smooth rough bumps and dry patches

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/Petroleum.jpg?v=1707970624&width=500)

### Pharmacuetical Grade Petroleum

Helps provide protective skin barrier and lock in moisture

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/Allantoin-ComfryRoot.jpg?v=1707970661&width=500)

### Allantoin

Helps increase smoothness while nourishing and soothing skin

![](https://glytone.com/cdn/shop/files/P0002028_Exfoliating_Body_Lotion.jpg?crop=center&height=1000&v=1707970407&width=1000)

## Product Benefits

*   Helps smooth away rough bumps and dry patches
*   Exfoliates dead surface skin cells
*   Visibly reduces the appearance of dark spots due to sun exposure
*   Softens and smooths skin
*   Rejuvenates and retexturizes the skin

How to Use

Apply daily to arms, back of hands, legs and other parts of the body that require special attention. Not recommended for the face, or immediately after shaving or hair removal. For optimal results, use after bathing with Glytone Exfoliating Body Wash.
